SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
Bill
The Bill class represents a bill for a particular item.
Cart
The Cart class represents a shopping cart that contains a list of bills.
CRUDApplicationMain
The CRUDApplicationMain class is the main part of the shopping application.
FileUtil
The class FileUtil defined the different static methods used to perform the different operations on file.
Item
The class used to represent the main entity Item from the application This class includes an item's Id, name and price and it can be serialized
ListUtil
This class contains several methods used to process different lists of items, stocks, and carts.
Stock
This class used to create an object which stores the stock information.
